metadata.title: CVE-2022-25972 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the gif2h5 functionality ofHDF5 Group libhdf5 1.10.4. A specially-crafted GIF file can lead to codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
